company.mission: Our Mission is to create a reliable and cost-effective food waste management system
company.vision: Solving waste management problems through innovative technologies, we are committed to creating sustainable solutions that significantly reduce environmental impact, paving the way for a cleaner greener future.
philosophy: Manufacturing innovative Waste Disposal Equipment that is simple to operate, easy to maintain and of international quality, combined with cost-effectiveness
Effective use of output from the Machine is also our major focus
Ultimate customer satisfaction by ensuring prompt after sales service is our commitment to customers who invested their trust in us
Continuous R & D to upgrade our Machines keeping pace with technological advancement worldwide

company_description.overview: Solwearth Ecotech Private Limited is one of the largest manufacturers of organic waste converters based in India with manufacturing facilities in Bengaluru. Established in 2014, Solwearth has marked a strong presence in all parts of India, Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, Maldives, Malaysia, UAE, Oman, Kuwait, Bahrain, and other locations at GCC with sales and technical teams to support the installations.
company_description.value_proposition: We have developed revolutionary food waste converter machines that meet the diverse waste management needs of businesses, from small restaurants to large-scale kitchens. Solwearth is focused on high-quality manufacturing by setting international standards for the entire range of products.
company_description.strengths: Solwearth is backed by the strength of highly qualified technocrats and a team of committed support staff. With continued research and development and manufacturing techniques, Solwearth assures to deliver the best sustainable solutions for food waste handling.
company_description.specialization: Complete and simple solution for Food / Organic waste disposal. Offering comprehensive waste management solutions by tying up with other companies specialized in conventional processes to suit the requirement of large Public Sector undertakings and Corporates.
company_description.experience: Over 11 years of proven track record in organic waste management (2014-2025)
company_description.market_position: One of the largest manufacturers of organic waste converters in India and Middle East

technology.name: Organic Waste Converter (OWC)
technology.type: Fully Automatic Food Waste Management System
technology.process: Multi-stage indirect heat and dry decomposition
key_features: Requires minimal space, power, and labor
Fully automatic operation with one-touch control
Reduces waste volume by up to 90%
Processes waste in less than 24 hours
Operates without emissions, smoke, or odor
No need for bacteria, additives, or water
Safety interlocks - impeller stops when door opens
advantages: 83-90% wet waste volume reduction in 12-30 hours
Converts organic waste into nutrient-rich soil enricher
environmental_benefits: Prevents methane emissions from organic waste decomposition
Reduces transportation costs and carbon footprint
Produces natural alternative to chemical fertilizers
Supports climate action and sustainability goals

key_features: Safety First - Impeller stops when door opens

frequently_asked_questions.question: How long does it take to convert waste to soil enricher?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: Depending on the model and capacity, our machines process waste in 12-30 hours. Most models complete the process in less than 24 hours.

frequently_asked_questions.question: What types of waste can be processed?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: Our machines handle all types of organic waste including food waste (cooked and raw), vegetables, fruits, yard waste, garden waste, and biodegradable paper products.

frequently_asked_questions.question: Do I need to add bacteria or additives?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: No. Our machines use multi-stage indirect heat and dry decomposition technology and do not require any bacteria, additives, chemicals, or water.

frequently_asked_questions.question: How much waste reduction can I expect?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: Our machines achieve 83-90% volume reduction of wet organic waste.

frequently_asked_questions.question: Is there any odor during operation?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: No. All models have integrated deodorization systems ensuring odor-free operation.

frequently_asked_questions.question: What is the power consumption?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: Power consumption varies by model from 2.8 Kw (SE-501) to 12 Kw (SE-1H).

frequently_asked_questions.question: What is the warranty period?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: All models come with a standard 1-year warranty with ongoing maintenance and support available.

frequently_asked_questions.question: Do I need special installation?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: No. Our machines are portable stand-alone units that require no special installation.

frequently_asked_questions.question: What is the output product?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: The output is a nutrient-rich soil enricher that should be mixed with soil at a 10:1 ratio (10 parts soil to 1 part output). It is NOT compost but a more concentrated soil conditioner.

frequently_asked_questions.question: How do I use the output from the machine?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: Mix the output with soil at a 10:1 ratio (10 parts soil to 1 part output) for landscaping, gardening, or agriculture. The output is more concentrated than traditional compost.

frequently_asked_questions.question: Which model is right for my facility?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: Model selection depends on your daily waste generation. Contact us for a free consultation and we'll recommend the right capacity for your needs.

frequently_asked_questions.question: How many customers use Solwearth machines?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: We have 500+ customers across 14 countries, including major brands like Marriott, Hilton, ITC Hotels, DLF, Brigade, L&T, IKEA, and many government institutions.
